alert.note: Alert for Humacao; Luquillo; Maunabo; Naguabo; Patillas; Yabucoa (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 08 at 8:31AM AST until November 08 at 11:00AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Humacao, Luquillo, Maunabo, Naguabo, Patillas and Yabucoa. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 829 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 2 inches of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fajardo, Humacao, Yabucoa, Maunabo, Naguabo, Patillas, Luquillo, Emajagua, Anton Ruiz, Martorell, Punta Santiago, Playita, Roosevelt Roads, Ramos, Playa Fortuna, Candelero Arriba, Comunas, Bajandas, Pena Pobre and Rosa Sanchez. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Humacao; Luquillo; Maunabo; Naguabo; Patillas; Yabucoa
